description: React component for an instructor co-teacher modal with chat functionality, including UI elements, state management, and API interaction.

classes.name: InstructorCoTeacherModal
classes.description: React functional component implementing a chat modal for AI-assisted instructor support.

methods.name: sendMessage
methods.description: Handles sending a message to the AI bot and updating chat messages, with error handling.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles form submission to send a message.
